rules_text:
Ward {1}
[i]Magecraft[/i] – Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, target creature you control can’t be blocked by more than one creature this turn.
notes:
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/zAza5d


Alter: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, target creature you control can’t be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.
